title: Conceptual Framework Design Process for Improving E-Learning Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learner role: Students/job seekers, Domain expertise: Intermediate, Assessment method: Project-based evaluation, Technology environment: Digital devices provided

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core components of the e-learning quality framework.
Learners can apply a three-tier quality evaluation standard (basic-intermediate-advanced) when designing mathematics education content.
Learners can propose three actionable strategies for improving online learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
